name: Seohyun for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Seohyun is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Kajang, Malaysia, but raised in Kuala Lumpur, Seohyun has very refined and delicate character.

During all her life she loves music and dancing. She attended dance school for 6 years and took part in dancing shows. She loves to show her beautiful body on public.

In the high school Seohyun understood that she is not monogamous. In her junior year of high school, a guy asked Seohyun on a date. He rented a Redbox movie and made a pizza. They were watching the movie and the oven beeped so the pizza was done. The guy looked her dead in the eye and said, "This is the worst part." Seohyun then watched this boy open the oven and pull the pizza out with his bare hands, rack and all, screaming at the top of his lungs. They never had a second date and after that she decided that she wants to have a lot of boyfriends and will go only on paid dates. So, she started her escort career and now she want to become a prostitute.

Help Seohyun to take her place on the street!

short_description: Seohyun is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
